curl.download_pdf:

curl.get_rss:

curl.oai_pmh:

curl 'https://eprint.iacr.org/oai?verb=ListRecords&metadataPrefix=oai_dc&from=2024-01-01'
curl.yearly_list:

python.oai_harvester:
from sickle import Sickle

# Harvest metadata via OAI-PMH - FREE!
sickle = Sickle('https://eprint.iacr.org/oai')

# List available sets
sets = sickle.ListSets()
for s in sets:
    print(f"Set: {s.setName} ({s.setSpec})")

# Get records from 2024
records = sickle.ListRecords(
    metadataPrefix='oai_dc',
    from_='2024-01-01',
    until='2024-12-31'
)

for record in records:
    if record.deleted:
        continue
    
    metadata = record.metadata
    print(f"\nTitle: {metadata.get('title', [''])[0]}")
    print(f"Authors: {', '.join(metadata.get('creator', []))}")
    print(f"Date: {metadata.get('date', [''])[0]}")
    print(f"Identifier: {metadata.get('identifier', [''])[0]}")
python.pdf_downloader:
import requests
import re
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup

def download_paper(year, paper_id, save_path=None):
    """Download a paper PDF - COMPLETELY FREE!"""
    
    # Construct PDF URL
    pdf_url = f'https://eprint.iacr.org/{year}/{paper_id:03d}.pdf'
    
    # Download PDF
    response = requests.get(pdf_url)
    
    if response.status_code == 200:
        if save_path:
            with open(save_path, 'wb') as f:
                f.write(response.content)
            print(f"Saved to {save_path}")
        return response.content
    else:
        print(f"Paper not found: {year}/{paper_id:03d}")
        return None

# Download paper 2024/001
pdf_content = download_paper(2024, 1, 'crypto_paper.pdf')
python.rss_parser:
import feedparser
import requests
from datetime import datetime

# Parse latest papers RSS feed - COMPLETELY FREE!
feed_url = 'https://eprint.iacr.org/rss/rss.xml'
feed = feedparser.parse(feed_url)

print(f"Latest {len(feed.entries)} cryptography papers (FREE!)")

for entry in feed.entries[:10]:
    print(f"\nTitle: {entry.title}")
    print(f"Authors: {entry.author if hasattr(entry, 'author') else 'N/A'}")
    print(f"Link: {entry.link}")
    print(f"Published: {entry.published}")
    print(f"Summary: {entry.summary[:200]}...")
python.search_papers:
import requests
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup

def search_iacr(query, search_type='title'):
    """Search IACR ePrint Archive - FREE!"""
    
    base_url = 'https://eprint.iacr.org/eprint-bin/search.pl'
    
    params = {
        search_type: query,
        'search': 'Search'
    }
    
    response = requests.get(base_url, params=params)
    soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, 'html.parser')
    
    papers = []
    # Parse search results
    for link in soup.find_all('a', href=re.compile(r'/\d{4}/\d+')):
        paper_url = f"https://eprint.iacr.org{link['href']}"
        title = link.get_text(strip=True)
        papers.append({
            'title': title,
            'url': paper_url,
            'pdf': paper_url + '.pdf'
        })
    
    return papers

# Search for post-quantum papers
results = search_iacr('post-quantum', 'title')
for paper in results[:5]:
    print(f"- {paper['title']}")
    print(f"  PDF: {paper['pdf']}")
python.yearly_archive:
import requests
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup

def get_papers_by_year(year):
    """Get all papers from a specific year - FREE!"""
    
    url = f'https://eprint.iacr.org/complete/{year}'
    response = requests.get(url)
    soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, 'html.parser')
    
    papers = []
    for row in soup.find_all('tr')[1:]:  # Skip header
        cols = row.find_all('td')
        if len(cols) >= 3:
            paper_link = cols[0].find('a')
            if paper_link:
                paper_id = paper_link.text.strip()
                title = cols[1].text.strip()
                authors = cols[2].text.strip()
                
                papers.append({
                    'id': paper_id,
                    'title': title,
                    'authors': authors,
                    'url': f'https://eprint.iacr.org/{paper_id}',
                    'pdf': f'https://eprint.iacr.org/{paper_id}.pdf'
                })
    
    return papers

# Get all 2024 papers
papers_2024 = get_papers_by_year(2024)
print(f"Found {len(papers_2024)} papers in 2024 (all FREE!)")
